short_summary: Purchase of Synology Data Storage Equipment or equivalent for Department of National Defence
description: The solicitation is for the purchase of Synology Data Storage Equipment or its equivalent for the Department of National Defence with simple addendums over a confidence interval. Suppliers can submit their proposal through SSC P2P portal with the portal link
full_summary:
# Solicitation for Synology Data Storage Equipment
=====================================================

**Legal and Contractual Information**

* Solicitation Number: SSC-24-00026922:T
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: BPM021699/26922
* Publication Date: July 15, 2024
* Closing Date and Time for Bid Submission: July 31, 2024 2:00 PM

**Contract Details**

* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence

**Technical Specifications**

* **Goods or Services:** Synology Data Storage Equipment or equivalent
* **GSIN (Government of Canada Schedule of Fees):** AJ212516 - Communications Network Software (R&D)
* **Optional Goods or Services Categories:** None

**Procurement Method**

* This solicitation will be conducted through a competitive process
* Open bidding is available for qualified suppliers

**Eligibility and Trade Agreements**

* Canada has entered into the following free trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

**Purchase Limitations**

* Restrictions are in place with regard to the total value of goods or services under the contract

**Trade and Tariff Information**

* Commodity Code: AJ212516
* Tariff Treatment: Subject to the provisions in Schedule I - Tariffs, Volume I and II, of the Customs Tariff

**Contact Information**

* **Supplier contacts:** Javier Ventura
Contact email: None
Contact Phone: 3435769329
Contact Fax: 3435769329
Contact Address: 180 Kent St, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1P 1B6
Contact Information - Canadian Trade Agreement Trade Canada: 
**Supplier and Trade Inquiry Website:** SSD-SPC Goods Canada https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/32A212C0-CE0A-4FC0-A8CC-142E098FA93E 

**Clarifications and Amendments**

* Canada has responded to supplier questions
* Requested correction for missed timelines or missed announcements

**Solicitation Notes**

* Suppliers are invited to purchase Synology Data Storage Equipment or equivalent for Department of National
